definition: a loose coverall (coat or frock) reaching down to the ankles, embellish by sewing in straight lines crossing each other diagonally
details:
noun
- a loose coverall (coat or frock) reaching down to the ankles
= synonyms: duster
verb
- embellish by sewing in straight lines crossing each other diagonally
= example: embellish by sewing in straight lines crossing each other diagonally
